description.value:
When you plant yourself in place, you’re difficult to move past.

Prerequisites: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.D6Pbf05RLr3vh7rb]{Stand Still}

Benefit: When you @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.Fu5eDR99bGo9WdUU#fight-defensively]{fight defensively}, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.GtSmojwt4d6rdEkm#attack-of-opportunity]{attack of opportunity} made to stop enemies from moving past you with Stand Still, and the DC of the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.3QdtsfnVJsHEdrt0]{Acrobatics} check to move through a square you threaten or your space increases by 2 until the beginning of your next turn.

Teamwork Benefit: If you’re adjacent to an ally who also has this feat when you fight defensively, your bonus increases to +4, and the DC to move through your space or a square you threaten increases by 4 instead of 2.

modifiers.name: Stand Strong (Combat, Teamwork)
modifiers.notes: When you fight defensively, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack of opportunity made to stop enemies from moving past you with Stand Still.

modifiers.name: Stand Strong (Combat, Teamwork)
modifiers.notes: Teamwork Benefit: If you’re adjacent to an ally who also has this feat when you fight defensively, your bonus to the attack of opportunity increases to +4.
